sub_title: Development piñata, CTO/CPO, Product/Development lead, Founder, Start-up specialist
summary:
***FYI: not interested in outsourcing IT, web development or apps. DO NOT PM me about this pls***
***FYI: send offers for recruits to the company email and NOT to me personally***
***NOTE: I will decline network invitations without intro if I have not explicitly met you in person before***

Call me a Developer, Designer, Programmer, Gamer, Snooker player, Digital painter, Technologist, Movie lover, Music lover, Art lover and general Geek. Combining the world of technology, science and art for work and pleasure is what I like to do.

My work comes together in the medium of web-technology. I have build a career around making the web-based projects happen. This I've done by using my technical knowledge to apply or consult, using my design knowledge to let it come to life and my project experience to get from point A to B.

Goals and Ambitions:
- Develop myself as a better software engineer.
- Improve my skills as a graphics and user interface designer.
- Participate in cool projects to develop web applications that change the world

Specialties: In my field (web-technology) my specialty is my non-specialization. I am good at filling gaps in a team. I pride myself with keeping up-to-date with the latest developments and keeping a broad perspective. I'm not just a web-developer. I also get involved early in product design.

awards.title: Accenture Innovation Award for Personalized Shopping & Paying
awards.description:
Dutch:
De ervaring van de winkelende klant wordt nooit meer hetzelfde door innovaties op het gebied van persoonlijke interactie, e-fulfilment en betalingen. Maak kennis met de winnaar van de Blauwe Tulp binnen dit thema:

Yippie! is een dealmaker app. Het helpt consumenten om deals te maken met shops. En Yippie! helpt shops om deals te maken met consumenten. Met de app kan een consument de barcode van een product scannen. Hij ziet dan direct de goedkoopste winkels voor dat artikel. Tegelijkertijd geeft Yippie! de online én fysieke shops die dat product aanbieden de kans om direct en automatisch een persoonlijk aanbod te doen aan de consument die het product scant. Dit kan bijvoorbeeld een tijdelijke korting zijn, maar ook een langere garantietermijn, een tegoedbon voor een volgende aankoop of extra accessoires.

Van harte gefeliciteerd met het winnen van de Blauwe Tulp!

awards.title: Best Retail Innovation Award 2015
awards.description: De juryprijs Beste Retail Innovatie is een vakprijs binnen het ABN AMRO Retailer of the Year concept en werd dit jaar voor de tweede keer gehouden. Retailers of bedrijven die actief zijn als toeleverancier of als dienstverlener voor retailers komen in aanmerking voor deze award.

awards.title: Startup Bootcamp E&M Commerce 2015
awards.description: Startupbootcamp is the global accelerator for startups with a mentor and alumni network from more than 30 countries across the world. Startupbootcamp runs accelerator programs in Amsterdam, Berlin, Copenhagen, Berlin, Dublin and Haifa. Each program selects 10 startups from 500 global applicants.

courses.name: What they always wanted to tell about science

profile_positions.description:
ITS collective is the overlaying company for the ITS companies. 

We deliver digital product development services to companies around the world with D'Agency ITS as a full-service agency. Our collective of 100+ specialists agilely work for you to bring you the best possible results in the given time. Fixed rates do not exist for us and everything is based on delivered work.

As Digital distributed broadcasting ITS we deliver a solution to large scale content distribution for temporary organizations. We distribute content for any entertainment or sports broadcasting by using our p2p distribution methods to both partners and consumers.

With Digital Market Control ITS we've created a system that allows large companies to manage digital and physical marketing campaigns. It is optimized to deal with large scale campaigns that last for a period of 3 months or longer. It deals with the distribution as well as analytics from campaigns.
profile_positions.title: CEO, Founder, planner and web development specialist

profile_positions.description: Helping the team grow current and future products for the EHS industry. Our efforts will be in making EHS processes more efficient, paperless and really make a dent in the organizations that have a constant need for improvements in their operations.
profile_positions.title: Lead Product Developer

profile_positions.description: First technical staff on the ground. Shaping the new team, help building the product and improving the development processes and in general helping the company get off the ground as a startup. Having my fingers in many pots and loving the experience.
profile_positions.title: CTO

profile_positions.description:
Help build up a grass roots tech conference in Amsterdam organized by the community, for the community, taking place March 31st 2017.

Our vision:

We are the conference for all the people in tech, those that code, design, found companies or work for those that do.

We are the conference where talks are based on experience and where the goal is to learn from the vast pool of knowledge in our city.

We are the place to meet the best and brightest minds around, meet the actual makers of the products founded in Amsterdam for a reasonable price.

We are a conference for the technology scene, by the technology scene.
profile_positions.title: Conference Co Organizer

profile_positions.description:
At Yippie! we don't like that when you shop online you get confronted with a jungle of banners, re-targeting and other forms of advertizement. It does not help the consumer to get the best deal while it is costing them money in the process. We want to change that by allow the user smooth and effortless access to all the information they need to get the best deal they can find. This without the banners! If a shop wants to get notice!? They should offer a shopper the best offer and that's where we come in!

We've build a browser plugin that automatically looks for the best deals when shopping and with our mobile app we allow consumers to get the best deals outside of the comforts of home. This just the beginning as we add more reasons for a consumer to buy using Yippie! every day.

Entered during Startup Bootcamp E&M Commerce program of 2014 as the third employee to grow the company in 3 months. With funding we were able to grow the team to 20+ people. Unfortunately folded after a bad run in with development partners.
profile_positions.title: CTO and Senior Developer

profile_positions.description: As an alumni I'll be helping out the program's startups to get through the 3 months at SBC towards demo day. I'm currently helping the E-commerce program of 2015
profile_positions.title: Startup Buddy

profile_positions.description:
So you did a trick on a spot in your neighborhood. You think you have it in you to become the OWNR of that spot? Battle it out with others on how has the right to call himself OWNR!

Social extreme sports app that allows users to battle it out who does the best trick on a spot. Skate, Snowboard, BMX... all are welcome to come and claim a spot.

My role is lead Technologist and co-founder
profile_positions.title: Co-founder & technical dude

profile_positions.description:
Quipper is an e-learning software company. As a Ruby developer I build several web-facing applications as well as providing API's to the mobile apps and worked on the lower layers of the data model. I moved around the stack from front to back and from architecture to design.

I also tried and bring my special start-up flavor to the company that has been struggling to establish a dev culture. Mixing fun with business and looking out for the little ones.
profile_positions.title: Web Developer

profile_positions.description:
As a web developer I'm worked on the website paper.li for SmallRivers. My work consisted out of many different things but it mainly revolved around getting the data and presenting it to the user. Everything around that is my domain... and sometimes even more.

Next to the technical and design side to my job I also helped to develop the business. Worked on project management mechanisms and worked out how we can best develop paper.li further.
profile_positions.title: Web Developer

profile_positions.description:
As a front end developer my goal was to re-design and rebuild the AquaBrowser what it is today and create a new compelling offering for public libraries. This includes design, research, development and everything that is needed to move the product to the next level.

Although the new product never came to see the day of light I had the possibility to impact they way the old product is maintained and further developed by contributing conceptually, technically and design wise.
profile_positions.title: Front End Developer

volunteer_experiences.description: Generally organizing events, having fun on the slack and making sure the community connects smoothly.
As a teacher at Codaisseur I teach Development bootcamp courses in various software development related subjects to beginning and intermediate students.

Railsgirls is about empowering women to build their own things on a computer using Ruby on Rails. In an environment dominated by males and stereotypes. I'm helping for those who do not fit that stereotype to become part of this exiting world of software development.

Although I have been a personal mentor before for several junior developers, including women, I am now getting myself involved in the Dutch branch of Railsgirls by teaching classes, helping out in general mentor sessions and supporting the main organizers as helping hands and as a cheerleader.

I've been helping out Codaisseur with their Development Bootcamp courses by acting as a keynote speaker and teacher.

Our world is relying more and more on computer systems. I believe that in the next 20 years it will become more and more essential for people to not only understand how to work with a computer but also to understand how a computer works. This allows people to do more with the tools available. Programming is not rocket science and at it’s core allows you to do amazing things from the comforts of your couch. I want to bring that power and pleasure to anyone who is willing to listen and learn.

Back in late 2015 I had the idea that we were missing something in the tech scene of Amsterdam, a grass roots conference. As the instigator of the idea I took it up to myself to work with Justin and Paddy to start organizing for Early 2017. Now with a date, first speaker and first sponsor know we are on our way to making this "by the community, for the community" conference happen.

Mission: .projectlodge aims to facilitate people to pursue their ideas and ideals in any field related to technology.

We find ourselves bringing ideas and people together to do projects that allow us to work and learn in a collaboration. Moving ideas and ideals into new level that can only be attained by working together. Thus a Educations, technological and a social cause.
